headline: GOP governors hatched a plan to undercut Trump's interference in elections: report
author: Tom Boggioni
sentences: The report states "...the Republican Governors Association decided to spend millions of dollars in primaries, an unusual step for an organization that typically reserves its cash for general election matchups against Democrats," before adding that the primary election to be held on Tuesday in Georgia involving Trump nemesis Gov.
